You are invited {!Contact.FirstName},
Back by popular demand, VinSolutions is again proud to sponsor Jim Ziegler's highly successful Internet Battle Plan - this time from our own backyard in Kansas City! Please join us May 18th-20th at the Argosy Casino & Spa for the biggest and best workshop yet.
You will not want to miss this!
Vin's very own Sean Stapleton, Chief Sales Officer, will join Ralph Paglia, Larry Bruce, Jim Ziegler and Special Guest Speakers to demonstrate numerous techniques, word tracts, strategies and real-life examples of dealerships that are dominating their competitors with technology-enabled marketing and Internet programs. This is hands-on 'real-world' stuff, not theory.
Clips and Testimonials from Battle Plan IV held in January 2011: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wq-nfEofPJ0 http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rHptBSP7kuk http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FZFBgAtSz3c http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EdNSc_Rn3LQ
THE MISSION:
In today's fiercely competitive retail environment, every dealership must be operating at maximum efficiency. Every profit center must be synergistically integrated with every other department in the dealership while, at the same time, producing their maximum profitability. Your only choices - Grow or Die.
YOUR TROOPS WILL LEARN:
- How to Maximize Existing Profit Centers and Create New Ones - How to Ensure that your Dealership doesn't Waste a Single Opportunity to do Business - Dealing with Credit Realities in the 21st Century - Methods, Programs, Marketing and Advertising Secrets to Drive Floor Traffic and Phone Traffic - Video Search Engine Maximization - How to turn your dealership into an Internet Sales Powerhouse - Facebook, Twitter, YouTube and LinkedInâ€¦ the guys will show you how to create dealership Social Community marketing programs that yield incredible returns - Growing Sales Volume... Integrating Prospective and Lead Generation Programs into Day-to-Day Activities - Tips, Tools and Techniques that Produce Immediate Results - Customer Relationship Management and CSI Engineering Projects that Lead to High Average Profitability and Top-Rated CSI Scores... building Value at ALL Levels for Customer Retention and Referrals
Dealer Principles are always FREE - we encourage you to use that registration fee saved by bringing your Internet Manager along to gain invaluable knowledge first-hand.
Give me a call today to find out more about how to register as a VIN special guest!
